hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Boomerang#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path to #the Key#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #a Piece of Heart# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 1 Bottom

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Shield#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Boomerang#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #Epona's Song#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple Boulder Maze Upper Chest

HC (Rock Wall).text: Have you seen my dodongo? Very large, eats everything, responds to "King".^Call Darunia in Goron City if found. Huge rupee reward!

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that inside the #lakeside lab# a person and a spider hold...^ #Arrows (5 pieces)# and #a Red Rupee#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that a #like-like in Ganon's Shadow Trial# guards #a Red Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Shadow Trial Golden Gauntlets Chest

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that a room containing a #large pot in the Shadow Temple# holds...^ #a Deku Stick# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple GS Single Giant Pot

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that ##Hyrule Castle## has #0# major items.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #an Ice Cavern Compass#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Huge Rupee#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: Long time watcher, first time player. Greetings from Termina. Incentive goes to Randobot's choice.
